meanings.definition: Unwilling to do a favor or help
meanings.sent1: She was very disobliging when I asked for her assistance.
meanings.sent2: The disobliging neighbor refused to lend a hand with the groceries.
meanings.sent3: The disobliging cat ignored my attempts to pet it.
meanings.sent4: His disobliging attitude cast a shadow over the entire event.
meanings.sent5: The disobliging storm clouds refused to give way to the sun.

meanings.sent1: The waiter's disobliging behavior made the dining experience unpleasant.
meanings.sent2: The disobliging clerk was unhelpful when I asked for directions.
meanings.sent3: The disobliging elevator decided to stop on every floor except mine.
meanings.sent4: Her disobliging remarks left a sour taste in everyone's mouth.
meanings.sent5: The disobliging traffic made me late for my appointment.
